34 void uileds_set_pattern (uileds_t* led, uileds_state_t* pattern, bool inverted)
35 {
36  led->pattern=pattern;
37  led->pstate=0;
38  led->inverted = inverted;
39 }
40 
41 void uileds_sync (uileds_t* which, uileds_t* with, bool inverted)
42 {
43  which->pattern = with->pattern;
44  which->pstate = with->pstate;
45  which->timer = with->timer;
46  which->inverted = with->inverted^inverted;
47 }

49 
50 void uileds_handler()
51 {
52  unsigned tmp;
53  uileds_t *current;
54 
55  for (tmp=0; tmp<UILEDS_COUNT; tmp++)
56  {
57  current=(uileds_t*)uileds_all_leds[tmp];
58 
59  if (!current->pattern) continue;
60 
61  if(!current->timer)
62  {
63  current->timer=current->pattern[current->pstate].duration;
64  current->set_led(current->pattern[current->pstate].lstate^current->inverted);
65 
66  if (!current->pattern[++current->pstate].duration)
67  {
68  current->pstate=0;
69  }
70  }
71 
72  current->timer--;
73  }
74 }
